activation.en: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

effect.en: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control a monster whose ATK was ? in the Deck, you can banish 1 card from your hand, then add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand with ? ATK, but with a different name than the cards you control. "Helios" monsters you control cannot be banished.
